name: averie, my princess
greetingText: i love you so so much
wishText: sweetheart every single day i cannot believe how lucky i am to have you
amongst trillions and trillions of stars, over billions of years
to be alive, and to get to spend this life with you, is so incredibly, unfathomably unlikely, so unfathomably rare
and yet here i am with the impossible chance to know you, to love you
i love you so much averie, more than all the time and space in the universe can contain
